backend/main.mo: Defines types and state for leases, profiles, requests, and provides CRUD operations with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old lease listing schema to the new format by wrapping optional fields and normalizing code/split ratio.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking frontend files to requirements for updated lease listing fields and UI behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend components and hooks across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point mounting the React app root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, hash history, theme provider, and root layout with profile modal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthStatusB: Shows the authenticated user's profile name in a header badge when available.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Prompts new authenticated users to enter and save their display name.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Route guard that blocks access and prompts login when the user is unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Incomi: Displays incoming lease requests for owners, with status updates and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/LeaseO: Dialog for creating or editing lease listings with validation for UUID and split ratios.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/OwnerO: Shows the owner's lease listings with actions to create, edit, or archive entries.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps pages with top navigation and footer layout structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with links, social icons, and branding details.
frontend/src/components/leases/EmptyStat: Reusable empty-state card showing a title and description.
frontend/src/components/leases/LeaseList: Card component displaying lease listing info and a link to details.
frontend/src/components/marketing/GetUni: Promotes the Unity Network mobile app with store links and branding.
frontend/src/components/media/YouTubeSho: Displays a grid of embedded YouTube Shorts cards with titles and descriptions, plus a link to the UnityNodesIO channel.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Renders the top navigation bar with links, login controls, responsive mobile menu, and branding.
frontend/src/components/requests/SubmitL: Provides a form for authenticated users to submit lease requests or prompts unauthenticated users to sign in.
frontend/src/components/requests/TenantR: Shows a table of the user’s lease requests with status, dates, and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity and invalidates related queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Wraps Internet Identity data to expose auth state, principal info, and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseListings.ts: Provides queries for fetching active lease listings and the owner’s listings through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeaseRequests.ts: Exposes hooks to submit lease requests, fetch tenant/owner requests, and update request statuses with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useOwnerDashboard.ts: Contains mutations for creating, updating, and archiving lease listings and handles related cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and saves the caller’s user profile using backend actor queries and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applying base styles to elements and headings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Authenticated dashboard page with tabs for offers and requests plus a YouTube Shorts section.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorksPage.tsx: Explains app usage through guided steps, feature cards, and ULO lease code information.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page with hero section, features, and call‑to‑action links for browsing leases.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseDetailsPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific lease listing, including copyable code and request form.
frontend/src/pages/LeaseListingsPage.tsx: Shows all active lease listings with sorting options and loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with message and button linking back to home.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters (including hash-based), storing/retrieving them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, requirements, constraints, issues, and existing features for building an ICP-hosted UNO/ULO lease-listing site.
